channel.title: The black screen of doom
channel.description:
I used this tutorial for auto-saving: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,8790.0.html
and when I compile I got no errors, then once I log in I just sit at a black screen.. I can go through the tabs like quests, stats, inventory ext. I can type in the chat and teleport myself with commands, I just cant see what i'm doing cause the screen won't load. :confused:
I used the search feature and found other topics of the same sort, but they were unanswered so I hope mine gets answered...

item.title: The black screen of doom

item.description:
@mehaku wrote:

search this dumdum lol

“if(players.disconnected) {”

and above that paste this

“saveGame(players); savechar(players);”

item.title: The black screen of doom
item.dc:creator: @mehaku mehaku
item.description:
@mehaku wrote:

just delete the one u added and do thist:

open playerhandeler and search if(players[i].disconnected) { and above it paste saveGame(players[i]); savechar(players[i]); and do it for both of em, cuz theres two, and it should look like this when you add it

saveGame(players[i]); savechar(players[i]);
if(players[i].disconnected) {
